verses.name: Luke 2:10
verses.text: And the angel said unto them, Fear not: for, behold, I bring you good tidings of great joy, which shall be to all people.

verses.name: Luke 2:11
verses.text: For unto you is born this day in the city of David a Saviour, which is Christ the Lord.

verses.name: Luke 2:12
verses.text: And this shall be a sign unto you; Ye shall find the babe wrapped in swaddling clothes, lying in a manger.

verses.name: Luke 2:13
verses.text: And suddenly there was with the angel a multitude of the heavenly host praising God, and saying,

verses.name: Luke 2:14
verses.text: Glory to God in the highest, and on earth peace, good will toward men.
